### Explanation:
The provided cipher is a rotary cipher used for encryption and decryption. The plaintext and ciphertext are both strings of uppercase letters without any punctuation or spaces. In this cipher, each character is encrypted or decrypted based on its position on discs. The rule defines how the outer and inner discs rotate.

In encryption, each character in the plaintext is replaced with the corresponding character on the inner disc. After encrypting `period` characters, the inner disc rotates to the right by `increment` characters. During decryption, each character in the ciphertext is replaced with the corresponding character on the outer disc. After decrypting `period` characters, the inner disc rotates to the right by `increment` characters.

The `increment` value rotates the inner disc the required number of characters and the `period` determines the number of characters that will be encrypted/decrypted before rotating the inner disc.

:::info

**rotary decipher.**

:::

**Rules in the game are actually based on this logic, but in the game there will be a 
few minor changes as follows and in a different reel number. Please note that in the game,
 you will be presented with ciphertext, but what you need to do is decrypt the ciphertext into its plain text. In the game, if you make an error, you simply have to click the "restart" button at the bottom of the game screen, but after each 5 correct answers you will hear "correct" and a tick mark on the screen and then you can continue guessing, and if you make 5 mistakes, you will hear "incorrect" and the cross mark on the screen, and your game will end. To restart the game, you can click the "restart" button at the bottom of the screen. In addition, while playing you can see the results on the right side of the screen  after 2-3 questions, and you can click on the right side of the screen to send a correct answer or a wrong answer, so if your game continues to work, you can send "correct" or "incorrect" depending on your guessed answer. You  also have an option to make your guesses on the next button on the game screen, so you can continue to guess.

**This AI is going to be added to a much bigger puzzle game where the player is the king of a country and if he can't find a way to encrypt and decrypt the player will lose his country hence his AI code can not be cracked or spoiled by different users. Hence why the rules are modified in the game as I mentioned.**
